title: Yo! AFRICA typeface
content:
hellodio ladies and gents!

Id the “Africa” if you don’t mind!

GRACIAS!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035459im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/AT%20logoBLUE%201_4630.tif)

 [‹ Goldman Sachs - modern/sans serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035459/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46026 "Go to previous forum topic") [Identify font called Sign Painter ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035459/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46022 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dubtron9000

comments.content: [This is all I can think of](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035459/http:/jurassicpark.szm.sk/myfiles/covers/jp/jurassic_park_a.jpg) when I seen Neuland Inline.

hmmmm...

close. quite close.  
maybe it’s just my very of Neuland. It’s a bit different.

Thanks though!

any other takers?
[This](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035459/http:/www.studio-gs.com/neuland.html) might be interesting for you to read.
